farming computers specs:

gpu: 4060ti (2 to 4 can be used)
cpu: 2698v4 * 2
motherboard: lga 2011-3 dual socket motherboard
ram: 256gb ram
ssd: 4tb storage
monitor: MSI Pro MP223 E2 22 Inch FHD Business Monitor (179)
cpu cooler: dual air coolers
case: Lian Li LANCOOL 207 Mid Tower ATX Cabinet White (269)
